articles.title: Revealed: how fake passports allow IS members to enter Europe and US - The Guardian
articles.description: Seller whose passports have been used by those who illegally crossed Syrian border says: ‘it is not my job to see who is bad’
articles.content: A booming online industry specialising in fake passports with official visas and travel stamps is offering people with links to Islamic State the opportunity to leave Syria and travel onwards to the … [+7118 chars]
